column5: I bought a camcorder the other day so i'm attempting to learn to do some basic videos with music for practice.  Took some fishing photos and a video and threw it to music.  Most of the pics are recent so some of you have likely seen them on this page.  They feature a few of my best fishing buds.  Cheers and enjoy!
Right on. Great video Dr...Im also a fan of your new blog  TDunn
Looks pretty good Luc. Can't wait to see the videos.
the new camcorder should arrive by early next week.  hopefully be toying with some steelie footage soon.
didnt have the net all summer so all them pics are new to me, thanks for the share, only 43 days left till specks open up here again.
Why does all fishing music sound the same...  It should be its own genre lol
very good job some nice fish was all that from this year
Real nice job on that! Looking forward to more to come!
Awesome slideshow Doc. i just did one too recently about icefishing...i never thought to include video clips like you did...once again...nice fish...awesome job...thanks for that.  Simon
Great job on the video Dr. and congrats on all those beauties Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great Vid but the music's gotta go.lol
it's hard to find music about fishing! i'm not really a country fan but any song about beer+fishing is cool with me!
It doesn't necessarily have to be about fishing. Just music that gets the adrenalin goin, cuz thats what fishin is all about! Beer+fishing for me = no fish.lol
